page.title: 14RECENT EVENTS IN MENSTRIE
page.content: {DCL Forty redundancies have been announced during the first week in June, 1985. This reduces the total work force to approximately 350.The redundancies are in the yeast manufacturing section. {BROOMHALL. } A ruined boys school recognised as a local landmark is being renovated.It is claimed that it is to be made into a spa hotel/sports complex. {BRITAIN IN BLOOM. After successes over the last few years the village is preparing gardens and flower pots for competition. Menstrie has been successful in winning prizes. {MENSTRIE CASTLE. Dating from the 15th century, it has been restored from a tumble_down condition to house a library, museum and residential flats.
